content.question:
The diagram shows the effect of a monetary policy action on aggregate demand.

Which of the following will shift the aggregate demand curve in the direction shown in the diagram above?

choices.label: A decrease in the money supply
A decrease in the monetary base
A decrease in the policy rate
An increase in the required reserve ratio
The sale of bonds to the private sector by the central bank

content.answer: A decrease in the policy rate

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
